alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Marion; Muscogee; Stewart (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marion, Muscogee, Chattahoochee and north central Stewart Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sand Hill, or near Columbus, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Cusseta, North Fort Benning, Bibb City, Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Jamestown/south Fort Benning, Renfroe, Rose Hill, Manta, Zellobee, Eelbeck/West Fort Benning, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park, Saint Marys Hills and Edgewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
